ygData.subject: RE: Re: BardSpeed
ygData.msgSnippet: Followed by, Ah, this is why I bought (camped) for these pointy things! Makes me laugh when I look back at all those times as a newbie fighting in nro
ygData.messageBody:
Followed by, "Ah, this is why I bought (camped) for these pointy things!"

Makes me laugh when I look back at all those times as a newbie fighting in
nro fighting with my lute in my hand. Once I realized I was only punching
the creature, I'd promptly switch to my weap and throw in an emote "Windleaf
bonks the orc with his lute." Then after the fight "Windleaf retunes his
lute.

I don't think anyone understood why I would sing, "My dog has fleas" when
doing this. Maybe they were all too young. :-)

Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 3:34 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: BardSpeed
>
>
> ah that would be where i say, "Wow i do a lot more damage
> with these swords
> than with this drum."
>
> Shada
